trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Rome
There were no other sightings in Rome on or around February 19th 2013
Summary: I was driving to a restaurant after my grandsons baseball game when I noticed the lights above the city.We pulled the truck over to watch them.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving my truck with both of my grandsons when I noticed the red blinking lights above the city.I asked aloud what is that and they asked what?I pulled over and my oldest grandson got out of the truck with me.Look at those lights.It was a large triangle with 2 red lights at the nose of it rotating.5 red lights total with the other 3 lights blinking and it was the size of a football field.We watched it come from the south of the city to northwest at a slow steady speed recording it with my cell phone.I havent watched the video closely,we did play it back but on the phone the screen is so small you cant really see anything.There was no noise associated with the object.We also saw an aiplane flying north to south at the same time the object was in the sky.
